p: To verify the reliability of the RNA-Seq data, the expression profiles of eight genes were analyzed using quantitative real-time PCR (qRT-PCR). These genes are listed in Supplemental Table S3. The expression patterns of the selected genes, in terms of the RPKM results, were consistent between the qRT-PCR and RNA-seq ( Figure 10). The following validation results for qRT-PCR indicate that the RNA-Seq data are quite reliable.
